Choose Your Own Adventure

Step-by-Step

  • Step 1

    Choose a Theme

    Are we lovers in a cozy seaside romance? Or perhaps rogue explorers chasing down a chance meeting, searching for something exhilerating? Are you ready to submit to your inner desires, and taste the spicier delights?

  • Step 2

    Pick a Location

    The setting to the story: the rainy cafe meetup transitioning into the cyber-punk rave. The REI shopping trip, and road trip karoke to the trailhead before a backcountry escape. The private dungeon with mood lighting to bring you to your knees.

  • Step 3

    Invite Friends

    Three's a party, and four's an adventure. Looking for additional travel partners, hotel orgies, or a willing submissive? Perhaps, a friendly trail dog to chase away the bears at night? Find your tribe.

  • Step 4

    Contact Me

    Are you ready to turn the page and see what adventure awaits?

  • Build
    Your Own
    Memory

Choose Your Theme

.

Gold

Sensual + Alluring. You bring your authentic self, and I'll provide the judgment-free companionship with empathy. Bi-curious are especially welcome to take a half step with me. I'm not quite girl, not quite boy, and not quite what you expect.

Diamond

Binding + Impactful. Whether you're a seasoned submissive or just curious about exploring your desires, I'll take you on a journey of discovery and pleasure. My favorites are Tease and Denial, Rope/Shabari, Impact, and power play (D/s, Dom/sub, etc). I offer combo Full Service escort and BDSM play.

Titanium

Exotic + Adventurous. In the wild, join me in seeking out new adventures. From backpacking the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Northern Alaska, to learning to ski in Colorado, to skydiving in upstate New York, I love thrill and novelty. I regularly go to non-stop raves, and enjoy rollerblading down Brooklyn streets.

The Backcountry

Why limit yourself to the resturant and hotel experience? Let me be a guide that can take you deeper than REI. I've backpacked the Artic Natinal Wildlife Refuge in AK, Applachian Trail in MA/NH/MA, Long Trail in VT, Joshua Tree National Park, and many other East Coast destinations. During the day, we'll explore the wonders of nature, stretching our legs under the big sky. A trail dinner, and then cuddle in close to keep each other warm on those chilly nights, as the sun drops away behind the mountains and the stars sparkle overhead as if shining just for us. References required for remote location overnights.

  • Base Rate: Quoted based on duration and location.
  • Location: Boston + Beyond. Tour Dates.
